title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: the easiest way to get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other open-source LLMs locally via a single CLI.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; identical API surface to the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embeddings and chat wrappers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-user support, model management, code highlighting & RAG.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenient, colourful CLI wrapper around Ollama for chatting, listing, pulling and scripting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair-programmer.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; simple DSL for generate/chat/embed with streaming support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server in Docker or Kubernetes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes for building RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, voice chat, PDF-QA, fine-tune, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart to deploy Ollama server with GPU support, PVC and autoscaling.

title: ollama-litellm-proxy
summary: LiteLLM proxy sub-project exposing Ollama models behind an OpenAI-compatible HTTP endpoint.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Minimal Streamlit app showing RAG-based PDF question-answering powered by Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-napi
summary: Native Node-API (NAPI-RS) bindings to Ollama for high-performance LLM inference in Node.js.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI writing assistance using Ollama; inline generation, summarization, grammar fix.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama models as a conversational bot with thread support.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBeaver DBee plugin adding SQL query explanation and generation via local Ollama LLMs.
